wget -O /tmp/pycharm.tar.gz "https://download.jetbrains.com/python/pycharm-community-2020.2.1.tar.gz?_ga=1.2.3.4"
# above string ga= number seems to accept anything

tar -xf /tmp/pycharm.tar.gz --directory /opt
ln -s "/opt/pycharm-community-2020.2.1/bin/pycharm.sh" /usr/bin/pycharm
apt-get install -y python3-distutils python3-apt

# create menu shortcut
echo '' | base64 --decode > /usr/share/applications/pycharm.desktop
